trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory must authenticate all the tasks that you perform on resources using the Azure Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory must authenticate all the tasks that you perform on resources using the Azure Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: The example shown here uses password authentication, for other approaches see [Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests][lnk-authenticate-arm].
trans-unit.target: The example shown here uses password authentication, for other approaches see [Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests][lnk-authenticate-arm].

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the **Main** method in Program.cs to retrieve a token from Azure AD using the application id and password.
trans-unit.target: Add the following code to the **Main** method in Program.cs to retrieve a token from Azure AD using the application id and password.

trans-unit.source: Create a **ResourceManagementClient** object that uses the token by adding the following code to the end of the **Main** method:
trans-unit.target: Create a **ResourceManagementClient** object that uses the token by adding the following code to the end of the **Main** method:

trans-unit.source: Create, or obtain a reference to, the resource group you are using:
